short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Simple New Tab (browser's home page) inspired by Google's 'Material You' design.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Material You NewTab

Transform your default new tab page with "Material You NewTab," a stylish new look inspired by Google’s Material You design. This extension offers a clean, customizable new tab experience packed with useful features:

Real-Time Weather: Displays up-to-date weather info, including city, temperature, and humidity, to keep you informed.

Flexible Search Options: Enter your search query, then easily choose your preferred search engine (Google, Bing, DuckDuckGo, YouTube, and more) with a single click—making it simpler than ever to switch between search providers.

Smart Search Suggestions: The search bar supports predictive suggestions, just like Google, helping you find what you need faster.

Personalized Customization: Enjoy a range of customization options, including color theme adjustments, the ability to add personalized text, switching the clock style (analog or digital), and adding your favorite shortcuts for easy access.

Multi-Language Support: Use the extension in a variety of languages, including हिन्दी, 中文, Português, Русский, Čeština, Tiếng Việt, and more.
Whether you want a functional new tab or a more personalized look, "Material You NewTab" brings convenience, customization, and a touch of style to your browsing experience.
